about_the_game:
This is a story of two magi, Vyn and Ilar, who find themselves trapped in a collapsing tower with their only hope for salvation being a difficult ritual. Or at least that is what Ilar tells you. The thing is - you don’t remember anything, and Ilar’s story makes less and less sense the closer you are to the ritual. Are they hiding things to protect you from the bitter truth, or are they deceiving you for some more nefarious reason?

Guide Vyn’s actions to death and beyond and uncover Ilar’s truth. Are they your colleague, lover or something completely different? Read between the lines of what they are telling you, explore your surroundings for clues and use hands-on deduction to break the vicious circle and set them free.

Features

  • 172 000 words or 8-40 hours of bittersweet suffering.

  • Over 500 choices, some more regrettable than others.

  • Around 50 false and 3 true endings. (It's not all bad, we promise)

  • A pretty nonbinary silver-tongued smug-face who might or might not murder you.

  • Yes, you do get to bone them, or get boned by them.

  • But you don't have to if that's not your thing.

  • A magnificent cat who cares not if you live or die.

  • An adorable eel friend.

  • Death. Lots of it.

  • An angry potato.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes descriptions of sexual themes, violence, blood, physical and mental abuse, self harm, death, and suicide. Characters are going through emotional struggle and are dealing with a life threatening situation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews:
“Square Weasel Studios has delivered an understated hit of an interactive visual novel, and I highly recommend it for people interested in that style of gaming experience.”
9.5/10 – Chalgyr's Game Room

“A gorgeously illustrated choose-your-own-adventure game that is filled with enigmatic characters and an alluring storyline that will have you just as wrapped in its mysteries as the protagonist is.”
8/10 – Gaming Cypher

“The game’s poignant storytelling experience stays with you once you reach its tender true ending. This VN is more than worth it, given the thoughtful messages and emotions it conveys.”
GOTY – RPG Fan
short_description: The Remainder is a dark fantasy mystery where you will try to save The High Magus Vyn from certain death. Will you find your way alone or will you reignite a lost love? Is it worth the sacrifice? Do you deserve to be saved?
